trends: There has been one other sighting in Kouvola
There were no other sightings in Kouvola on or around December 17th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsDear Sirs It came from northeast and I noticed it because it shined so brightly and it was FAST, much faster than aeroplane, light was kind of yellowish.I had never seen anything quite like that before.(The whole duration of this event was about 12 sec - I grabbed my phone instantly). Then the light started to faint - object was oval shaped from my point of view (its hard to tell)its colour was maybe gray.The object was approx. 5km away. And then suddenly this object changed its way. I tought it went north but it seems it did the opposite. It happened so fast I just couldnt realize - it was gone. I was driving my car and I managed to snap 2 photos durin the event. I drove alone. I just happened to have my phone at hand when all this happened. And luckily I just did wash my car so that windshield was clean! And what made feel uncertain about all this is that in the photos there is two objects - I only saw one. I would like to remain anonymous Sincerely, Mr. P
